page.title: 02HOLY FAMILY PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content:
{Holy Family Primary School}is on a large council estate to the south of Rochdale centre. It has a staff of five full-time and one part-time teacher, with the assistance of a qualified nursery nurse, to deal with over 100 children between the ages of four and ten.
There are close links with the parish church, this being a Roman Catholic school, and the Parish Priest is a frequent visitor.
The school is built on the side of a hill, which has certain scenic advantages and other more practical disadvantages: in effect it is on three distinct levels which makes the movement of heavy equipment rather problematical.
